attributes.action: Change the way claims for disabled benefits, Failing and refusing us benefits
attributes.additional_details: Disability groups on Facebook, Have gone through it myself and I have seen many others in the same situation as myself, They are accepting our mental health and deny other health conditions, The people who are carrying out the assessments needs to be investigated, To save time and money and having to appeal, The whole system is a failure and action needs to be taken against those at DWP
attributes.background: People with Mental Health and other health conditions are being denied disability benefits, They been failed at assessment, Mandatory Reconsideration been refused, They not even bothered to look at the supporting doctors letter that are being sent in, Its made to deny us disability benefits

rejection.details:
As we said in our email, we can’t accept your petition as petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what changes you’d like the Government or Parliament to make to the benefits system. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might also like to consider signing one of these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/233785
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/226182
